recommendations: Ankit Agrawal â€œHe has been an invaluable asset as a Senior Product Manager at AppsForBharat . He has consistently demonstrated exceptional skills and dedication in driving our product initiatives forward. His passion for understanding customer needs is unparalleled. He is the ultimate team player! Working with him is an absolute joyride. Another thing I absolutely admire about Rishi is his fearless approach to tackling challenges.â€

He has good people & communications skills, which he uses effectively when coordinating with varied stakeholders on a project. It was a great experience working alongside him on our projects. â€
